title: Requesting the ›belongs-to-company‹ relationship when one exists
gherkin:
Given there exists a "BRAND" "Audi"
And there exists a "belongs to company" relationship "R" for "Audi"
When the user requests the "belongs to company" relationship for "Audi"
Then the request should be confirmed with status code 200
And the response should return the relationship "R"
